fullText: This revival of Andrew Lloyd Webber and Tim Rice's 1971 rock opera is faithful to the original spirit, but it lacks the rawness and danger that made the show so electrifying in its early incarnations.
dtliExcerpt: This revival of Andrew Lloyd Webber and Tim Rice's 1971 rock opera is faithful to the original spirit, but it lacks the rawness and danger that made the show so electrifying in its early incarnations.
